mm_homepage.context: The text that appears as the title of the main menu on the homepage.

mm_about.context: The text that appears as the title of the main menu on the 'About Us' page.

somekey.context: An example key at the top level of the JSON.

somekey::sub.context: An example key at the second level of the JSON.

login.context: The text that appears on the login button.

signup.context: The text that appears on the signup button.

settings.context: The text that appears as the label for the settings page.

notifications.context: The text that appears as the label for notifications settings.

profile.context: The text that appears as the label for the user's profile page.
